column4: you still need eth0 configured somewhat in /etc/network/interfaces
auto lo iface lo inet loopback is all that is in there
enter this in /etc/network/interfaces which i currently have setup
if i add auto eth0 to interfaces then that means i have configured network manually and cannot use network manager which is not what i want
should i keep the lo lines in there too and just add auto eth0?
it says when i do a networking restart ignoring unknown interface eth0=eth0
shows i am connected as usual
in the edit connections it says under last used...never
